DOC.brief_summary: Descriptive study of the residual anti-pneumococcal immunity in patients with Anti-neutrophil cytoplasmic antibody (ANCA)-associated vasculitis (AAV) who have previously gone through pneumococcal immunization.
DOC.brief_title: Residual Anti-pneumococcal Immunity After Pneumococcal Immunization in ANCA-associated Vasculitis
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose of this study is to determine, through serotype-specific enzyme linked immunosorbent assay (ELISA) and opsonophagocytosis (OPA) titres whether AAV patients who have gone through pneumococcal vaccination are protected against invasive pneumococcal diseases (IPD).
